issue.title: [C++] Support limit operation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16628](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16628). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Either an option to a SinkNode (TopK already takes a number of results to keep) or a streaming LimitNode that only lets N rows through.
